BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: Oversight - Street Cleanliness
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that notices of violation issued by the department of sanitation be accompanied by a photograph of the alleged violation

Items.MatterName: Requiring that notices of violation issued by the department of sanitation be accompanied by a photograph of the alleged violation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of sanitation to install and fill dog waste bag dispensers on public litter baskets

Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of sanitation to install and fill dog waste bag dispensers on public litter baskets.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.237-B, legislation to amend the Environmental Conservation Law, in relation to returnable bottles.
